# 🛒 Fullstack eCommerce Application

This project is a full-featured **eCommerce web application** built using a modern fullstack architecture. It will allow users to browse products, manage a shopping cart, register/login, place orders, and make payments online. It also includes admin functionality for product and order management.

---


## 🚀 Project Overview

**Goal:**  
Build a responsive and scalable eCommerce platform where customers can:

<!-- @import "[TOC]" {cmd="toc" depthFrom=1 depthTo=6 orderedList=false} -->

- Browse a product catalog
- Add/remove products from their cart
- Register and log in to manage their orders 
- Place orders and pay with a credit card (Stripe)
- View order history
- track oder 
-live chat 

**Admins** will be able to:

- Manage products (CRUD)
- View/manage user orders

---

## 🧱 Technology Stack

### 🖥️ Frontend
You can choose one of the following frameworks:
- **React.js** (Vite + React Router)
- **OR Next.js** (App Router or Pages Router)

Additional Tools & Libraries:
- `Axios` for HTTP requests
- `React Router DOM` (if using React)
- `Tailwind CSS` or `CSS Modules` for styling
- `Context API` or `Redux` for global state (cart/auth)

### 🌐 Backend
- **Node.js** with **Express.js** for REST API
- **Sequelize ORM** to connect to PostgreSQL
- **PostgreSQL** as the database
- **JWT** for user authentication and route protection
- **bcryptjs** for password hashing
- **Stripe** for credit card payments
- `dotenv`, `cors`, and other middleware

---

## ✨ Features

### 👤 User Features
- Register & login securely with JWT
- View all products
- View product details
- Add/remove products in cart
- Checkout and pay using Stripe
- View their order history

### 🛠 Admin Features
- Admin login (isAdmin flag)
- Create, edit, delete products
- View all customer orders

---

## 📦 Key Modules

### Authentication
- Secure registration & login with password hashing
- JWT token for route protection
- Role-based access (user vs admin)

### Product Management
- Product model: name, description, price, image, stock, category
- Admins can add/edit/delete products
- Public API to fetch and display products

### Cart & Orders
- Add/remove/update cart items (frontend-managed)
- Order model stores product list, total, and status
- User order history and admin order dashboard

### Payments
- Integration with **Stripe**
- Stripe Checkout or card input form
- Payment success/failure handling

---

## 🌐 Deployment Plan

- **Frontend**: Deploy to Vercel or Netlify (React/Next.js)
- **Backend**: Deploy to Render, Railway, or VPS (Node.js)
- **Database**: Hosted PostgreSQL on Railway, Supabase, or ElephantSQL

---

## ✅ Prerequisites

To build and run this project, you need:

- Node.js (v18+)
- PostgreSQL (locally or cloud-hosted)
- Stripe account for API keys
- Git + GitHub
- Basic knowledge of JavaScript, React or Next.js, Express, and SQL

---

## 🔧 Setup & Development Plan

This project will be developed step by step:

1. **Initialize backend**: set up Express, Sequelize, PostgreSQL, models & routes
2. **Set up frontend**: React or Next.js with routing and global state
3. **Build auth system**: JWT login/register, secure routes
4. **Build product pages**: product list, detail, filters
5. **Implement cart logic**: add/remove/update quantities
6. **Create order system**: backend order routes and order history
7. **Integrate Stripe**: payment form or redirect, payment status
8. **Build admin panel**: product and order management
9. **Polish & deploy**

---

 Key Responsibilities

controllers/ – Contains the business logic for each route.

routes/ – Defines all API endpoints and connects them to controllers.

middleware/ – Auth and role checks for protected routes.

models/ – Sequelize models representing database tables.

utils/ – Helper functions like JWT generation.

# 🛒 Fullstack eCommerce App with Custom Admin Dashboard

This project is a full-featured eCommerce platform built using:

- **Frontend**: React.js
- **Backend**: Node.js with Express.js
- **Database**: PostgreSQL (via Sequelize ORM)
- **Authentication**: JWT
- **Payments**: Stripe
- **Admin Panel**: Custom-built in React

---

## 📦 Summary of Packages

| Package       | Purpose                                 |
|---------------|------------------------------------------|
| `express`     | Web framework for building APIs          |
| `sequelize`   | ORM for PostgreSQL                      |
| `pg`          | PostgreSQL driver for Node              |
| `pg-hstore`   | Required by Sequelize for PostgreSQL    |
| `cors`        | Handles cross-origin requests           |
| `dotenv`      | Loads environment variables             |
| `bcryptjs`    | Password hashing                        |
| `jsonwebtoken`| Token-based authentication (JWT)        |
| `stripe`      | Stripe payment API integration          |
| `nodemon`     | Automatically restarts server on changes|

## 🧭 Main Pages & Routes

| Route               | Page Component       | Description                                       |
|---------------------|----------------------|---------------------------------------------------|
| `/`                 | `Home.jsx`           | Landing page with featured products               |
| `/products`         | `Products.jsx`       | All products with optional category filter        |
| `/products/:id`     | `ProductDetail.jsx`  | View one product with add-to-cart option          |
| `/cart`             | `Cart.jsx`           | See and update items in the cart                  |
| `/checkout`         | `Checkout.jsx`       | Address, payment, and order summary               |
| `/login`            | `Login.jsx`          | Login form                                        |
| `/register`         | `Register.jsx`       | Registration form                                 |
| `/orders`           | `OrderHistory.jsx`   | View past orders                                  |
| `/order-success`    | `OrderSuccess.jsx`   | Confirmation after successful payment             |

---

## 🔐 Authentication (Frontend)

- Use JWT tokens received from backend
- Store token in `localStorage`
- `AuthContext` to track login status and user info
- `ProtectedRoute` to guard `/orders`, `/checkout`

---

## 🛒 Cart Management

- Use `CartContext` (or Zustand/Redux) to store cart globally
- Persist cart in `localStorage`
- Components: `CartItem.jsx`, `CartSummary.jsx`
- Automatically calculate subtotal/total/taxes

---

## 💳 Stripe Payment Integration

- Use `@stripe/stripe-js` and `@stripe/react-stripe-js`
- Collect credit card info securely
- Handle success & error cases
- Confirm order and redirect to `/order-success`
